name: CreateDatasource
description: Deploys Azure Search Datasources from a JSON definition
author: Mikael Stadden

inputs.name: SearchServiceName
inputs.label: Search Service Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of your Azure Search Service

inputs.name: ApiKey
inputs.label: API Key
inputs.helpMarkDown: Azure Search API Key that is used to create objects in Azure Search

inputs.name: SearchServiceApiVersion
inputs.label: Search Service API Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: API Version of Azure Search to use when creating your datasource

inputs.name: DatasourceJsonPath
inputs.label: Datasource JSON File Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to the JSON file that defines your Azure Search Datasource

inputs.name: OverwriteExistingDatasource
inputs.label: Overwrite existing datasource if it exists?
inputs.helpMarkDown: If set, will delete an existing Azure Search datasource of the same name before creating the specified datasource.
